text: laealiy astdrk ma dyaet min al'iiman waltae. lays lah dhlk, fala yjab 'iilaa ma talab wala yumhal. fa'iinama hi kalimat hu qayiluha qawlana la ynfeh, wahu fih ghyr sadq, falaw rudd 'iilaa aldunya liead 'iilaa ma nuhy enh, wasayabqaa almtwffawn fi alhajiz walbarzkh aldhy bayn aldunya walakhirat 'iilaa yawm albaeth walnshwr
